name: SEEKERS (itch) (omikoi)
description:
Controls 

Joystick - Move 

Button One - Sprint 

Button Two - Jump 

Seekers is a two-player racing game in which the objective is to avoid the obstacles and reach the finish line first! 

The game concludes the Game Development class and 3D Modeling class at UCLA, reflecting all learned skills in both Unity and Blender.
